meanings.definition: The quality of being customary or habitual.
meanings.sent1: Her customariness in always wearing a red scarf made her easy to spot in a crowd.
meanings.sent2: The customariness of having tea at 4 o'clock is a tradition in their family.
meanings.sent3: His customariness of eating ice cream with a fork always made his friends chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The customariness of the old clock's ticking filled the house with a sense of comfort.
meanings.sent5: The customariness of the daily morning walk helped him stay healthy and active.

meanings.definition: The state of being in accordance with established practice or tradition.
meanings.sent1: The customariness of bowing when greeting someone is a sign of respect in their culture.
meanings.sent2: In their village, the customariness of celebrating harvest season with a feast brings everyone together.
meanings.sent3: The customariness of wearing mismatched socks to work on Fridays always brought a smile to her coworkers' faces.
meanings.sent4: The customariness of the annual fireworks display lit up the night sky with bursts of color.
meanings.sent5: The customariness of singing happy birthday before blowing out the candles made the birthday party complete.
